snippet: Proposed changes to the NBA's draft lottery format designed to distribute the odds more evenly among the non-playoff teams failed to pass at the league's board of governors meeting on Wednesday, Commissioner Adam Silver said....

headline.print_headline: Plans to Reform NBA Draft Lottery Fail to Pass
headline.main: Plans to Reform NBA Draft Lottery Fail to Pass

lead_paragraph: Proposed changes to the NBA's draft lottery format designed to distribute the odds more evenly among the non-playoff teams failed to pass at the league's board of governors meeting on Wednesday, Commissioner Adam Silver said.
